title: Construction of organic–inorganic hybrid composites derived from C3N5 incorporated with CeO2 for enhanced photocatalytic hydrogen evolution
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,2604-2612
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00476K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ashil Augustin, Manova Santhosh Yesupatham, M. D. Dhileepan, Sanguk Son, Ezhakudiyan Ravindran, Bernaurdshaw Neppolian, Hyoung-il Kim, Karthikeyan Sekar
We report the synthesis of a novel organic–inorganic hybrid composite comprising C3N5 integrated with CeO2 engineered to significantly enhance photocatalytic hydrogen evolution.
